title: Lending Club Accepted Loans Schema (2007-2018Q4)
description: Schema for Lending Club accepted loans data from 2007 to 2018 Q4

id.description: A unique LC assigned ID for the loan listing

member_id.description: A unique LC assigned ID for the member that took the loan

loan_amnt.description: The listed amount of the loan applied for by the borrower

funded_amnt.description: The total amount committed to that loan at that point in time

funded_amnt_inv.description: The total amount committed by investors for that loan at that point in time

term.description: The number of payments on the loan. Values are in months and can be either 36 or 60

installment.description: The monthly payment owed by the borrower if the loan originates

emp_title.description: The job title supplied by the Borrower when applying for the loan

home_ownership.description: The home ownership status provided by the borrower during registration

annual_inc.description: The annual income provided by the borrower during registration

verification_status.description: Indicates if income was verified by LC, not verified, or if the income source was verified

issue_d.description: The month which the loan was funded

pymnt_plan.description: Indicates if a payment plan has been put in place for the loan

url.description: URL for the LC page with listing data

desc.description: Loan description provided by the borrower

purpose.description: A category provided by the borrower for the loan request

title.description: The loan title provided by the borrower

zip_code.description: The first 3 numbers of the zip code provided by the borrower in the loan application

addr_state.description: The state provided by the borrower in the loan application

dti.description: The ratio of total monthly debt payments divided by monthly income

delinq_2yrs.description: The number of 30+ days past-due incidences of delinquency in the borrower's credit file for the past 2 years

earliest_cr_line.description: The month the borrower's earliest reported credit line was opened

inq_last_6mths.description: The number of inquiries in past 6 months (excluding auto and mortgage inquiries)

mths_since_last_delinq.description: The number of months since the borrower's last delinquency

mths_since_last_record.description: The number of months since the last public record

open_acc.description: The number of open credit lines in the borrower's credit file

total_acc.description: The total number of credit lines currently in the borrower's credit file

initial_list_status.description: The initial listing status of the loan. Possible values are - whole, fractional

out_prncp.description: Remaining outstanding principal for total amount funded

out_prncp_inv.description: Remaining outstanding principal for portion of total amount funded by investors

total_pymnt.description: Payments received to date for total amount funded

total_pymnt_inv.description: Payments received to date for portion of total amount funded by investors

last_credit_pull_d.description: The most recent month LC pulled credit for this loan

last_fico_range_low.description: The lower boundary range the borrower's last FICO at time of application

last_fico_range_high.description: The upper boundary range the borrower's last FICO at time of application

collections_12_mths_ex_med.description: Number of collections in 12 months excluding medical collections

mths_since_last_major_derog.description: Months since most recent 90-day or worse rating

policy_code.description: publicly available policy_code=1 new products not publicly available policy_code=2

application_type.description: Indicates whether the loan is an individual application or a joint application with two co-borrowers

annual_inc_joint.description: The annual income provided by the co-borrower during registration

dti_joint.description: The ratio of total monthly debt payments divided by monthly income for co-borrower

verification_status_joint.description: Indicates if the co-borrower's income was verified by LC, not verified, or if the income source was verified

acc_now_delinq.description: The number of accounts on which the borrower is now delinquent

tot_cur_bal.description: Total current balance of all accounts

open_acc_6m.description: Number of open trades in last 6 months

open_il_6m.description: Number of currently active installment trades

open_il_12m.description: Number of installment accounts opened in past 12 months

open_il_24m.description: Number of installment accounts opened in past 24 months

mths_since_rcnt_il.description: Months since most recent installment accounts opened

total_bal_il.description: Total current balance of all installment accounts

il_util.description: Ratio of total current balance to high credit/credit limit on all install acct

open_rv_12m.description: Number of revolving trades opened in past 12 months

open_rv_24m.description: Number of revolving trades opened in past 24 months

max_bal_bc.description: Maximum current balance owed on all revolving accounts

all_util.description: Balance to credit limit on all trades

inq_last_12m.description: Number of credit inquiries in past 12 months

acc_open_past_24mths.description: Number of trades opened in past 24 months

avg_cur_bal.description: Average current balance of all accounts

bc_open_to_buy.description: Amount of time (in months) between the date the credit line was established and the date of the purchase for the most recent bankcard account

bc_util.description: Ratio of total current balance to high credit/credit limit for all bankcard accounts

delinq_amnt.description: The past due amount owed for the accounts on which the borrower is now delinquent

mo_sin_old_il_acct.description: Months since oldest bank installment account opened

mo_sin_old_rev_tl_op.description: Months since oldest revolving account opened

mo_sin_rcnt_rev_tl_op.description: Months since most recent revolving account opened

mo_sin_rcnt_tl.description: Months since most recent account opened

mths_since_recent_bc.description: Months since most recent bankcard account opened

mths_since_recent_bc_dlq.description: Months since most recent bankcard delinquency

mths_since_recent_revol_delinq.description: Months since most recent revolving delinquency

num_accts_ever_120_pd.description: Number of accounts ever 120 or more days past due

num_actv_bc_tl.description: Number of currently active bankcard accounts

num_actv_rev_tl.description: Number of currently active revolving trades

num_rev_tl_bal_gt_0.description: Number of revolving accounts with balance >0

num_tl_120dpd_2m.description: Number of accounts currently 120 days past due (updated in past 2 months)

num_tl_30dpd.description: Number of accounts currently 30 days past due (updated in past 2 months)

num_tl_90g_dpd_24m.description: Number of accounts 90 or more days past due in last 24 months

num_tl_op_past_12m.description: Number of accounts opened in past 12 months

percent_bc_gt_75.description: Percentage of all bankcard accounts > 75% of limit

revol_bal_joint.description: Sum of revolving credit balance of the co-borrowers

sec_app_fico_range_low.description: FICO range (low) for the secondary applicant

sec_app_fico_range_high.description: FICO range (high) for the secondary applicant

sec_app_earliest_cr_line.description: Earliest credit line date for the secondary applicant

sec_app_inq_last_6mths.description: Number of inquiries in the last 6 months for the secondary applicant

sec_app_mort_acc.description: Number of mortgage accounts for the secondary applicant

sec_app_open_acc.description: Number of open trades for the secondary applicant

sec_app_revol_util.description: Ratio of total current balance to high credit/credit limit for the secondary applicant

sec_app_open_il_24m.description: Number of installment accounts opened in past 24 months for the secondary applicant

sec_app_num_rev_accts.description: Number of revolving accounts for the secondary applicant

sec_app_chargeoff_within_12_mths.description: Number of charge-offs within 12 months for the secondary applicant

sec_app_collections_12_mths_ex_med.description: Number of collections in 12 months excluding medical collections for the secondary applicant

sec_app_mths_since_last_major_derog.description: Months since most recent 90-day or worse rating for the secondary applicant

sec_app_mort_acc.description: Number of mortgage accounts for the secondary applicant

sec_app_earliest_cr_line.description: Earliest credit line date for the secondary applicant

hardship_flag.description: Indicates if the borrower has been on a hardship plan

hardship_reason.description: Describes the reason for the hardship plan

hardship_status.description: Current status of the hardship plan

deferral_term.description: Number of months of the deferral period

hardship_amount.description: The payment amount the borrower has agreed to pay under the hardship plan

hardship_start_date.description: The start date of the hardship plan

hardship_end_date.description: The end date of the hardship plan

payment_plan_start_date.description: The start date of the payment plan

hardship_length.description: Number of months in the hardship plan

hardship_dpd.description: Account days past due as of the hardship plan start date

hardship_loan_status.description: Loan status as of the hardship plan start date

orig_projected_additional_accrued_intere.description: Projected additional interest to be accrued as of the hardship plan start date

hardship_payoff_balance_amount.description: The payoff balance amount as of the hardship plan start date

hardship_last_payment_amount.description: The last payment amount as of the hardship plan start date

hardship_last_payment_date.description: The last payment date as of the hardship plan start date

debt_settlement_flag.description: Indicates if the loan is in debt settlement

debt_settlement_flag_date.description: The date when the loan entered debt settlement

settlement_status.description: The status of the debt settlement

settlement_amount.description: The amount of the debt settlement

settlement_date.description: The date of the debt settlement

settlement_percentage.description: The percentage of the debt settled

settlement_term.description: The number of months in the debt settlement plan
